thread.section_title: Park Street Bathrooms Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of parkstreetbathrooms.com
thread.title: T.J.
thread.title_full: Park Street Bathrooms reviewed by T.J.

author: T.J.
title: T.J.
text: Their reviews were better than most ,I found a cheaper one with a company with worse reviews ,they were more than happy to price match ,replied promptly ,kept me informed and delivered within three days on the day they said they would.I was very happy with my product (Lakes overbath wall to wall screen)so obviously I recommend them T.P.
